mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kelley, Benjamin F. to Wheat, James S.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kelley, Benjamin F.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: J. S. Wheat, Adjt Genl Wheeling Sept 13 1861. By Telegraph from Grafton . 13 1861. We have no ordnance stores except musket & Enfield Rifle Cartridges and fifty (50) horse pistols old turned in by the Ringgold Cavalry Equipments & Ordnance stores are plenty at Ordnance department at Clarksburg. BF Kelley Brig Genl 33Gr104pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kelley, Benjamin F.
Grafton, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Wheat, James S.
